pages.text: $(l)1. FullBrightnessToggle: Press 'G' to enable fullbright.$(br)2. Camera: Take or upload pictures, display them on an image frame. Shift-right-click with the camera to select a filter.$(br)3. Inventory sorter: Middle click in a chest or your inventory to sort it.$(br)4. Dice: Roll a die in 16 colors.$(br)5. Nature's Compass: Find any biome using a compass.$(br)6. Snad: Grow sugar cane and cacti faster.
